Pet_Food.name: Calibra Dog Hypoallergenic Adult Medium Breed / Lamb & Rice
Pet_Food.body:
Calibra Dog Hypoallergenic Adult Medium Breed / Lamb & Rice

Complete dry food for medium breed (10-30kg) adult dogs

User Friendly for adult large weighing between 10 and 30kg

Features
  • High lamb meat content, low grain content (only rice)
  • Highly digestible hypoallergenic recipe(0% wheat,0% soy, 0% maize)
  • Salmon oil as a source of omega-3 unsaturated fatty acids for healthy skin and coat
Contents and Packing
  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray
Instructions for use

Spread all of the sand into a clean and empty litter tray, and let the cat freely urinate onto the sand. The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Medical_Devices.name: Feline Urine Collection kit
Medical_Devices.body:
Feline Urine Collection kit

Feline urine collection kit is a unique hydrophobic sand with biodegradable and safe coating.

User Friendly for Cats, Pet owners, Vets and Technicians

Features

  • Clean uncontaminated sample
  • Safe & Economical
  • Non invasive
  • Natural & Biodegradable
  • Veterinarian recommended

Contents and Packing

  • Kit includes Hydrophobhic sand, Disposal tray, Vial, Pipette and disposing bag
  • 1x300g sand x 1vial x 1 pipette x 1 disposal tray

Painless procedure with ease and convenience of urine collection

 

Instructions for use:

Spread all of the sand into a clean and empty litter tray, and let the cat freely urinate onto the sand. The cat’s urine will stay on the top allowing you to collect the urine using the pipette and vial that is included into the kit. The entire content of one bag is require to collect a single urine sample. If required, use more than one bag of sand.

Medical_Devices.name: Hot and Cold Pack
Medical_Devices.body:
Hot and Cold Pack

Reusable and convenient pack for Dual purpose therapy

Applications:

  1. Cold pack is generally recommended for first 48 hours following injury. Relieves inflammation, swelling and pain
  2. Hot pack is generally recommended 48 hours after injury. Improves flexibility of tendons, ligaments, reduce muscle spasm and alleviate pain.
  3. Can be used at multiple sites (Knee, thigh, hip, back, shoulder, neck etc.)
  4. Economical and easy method
  5. Suitable for continuous treatment, if needed

Instructions for use:

For cold use:

Place pack in the freezer for up to 2 hours before use. Wrap in a cloth or protective sleeve before applying directly to the skin. Use pack in short intervals no longer than 20 mins. Remove pack if feels uncomfortable

For hot use:

Place pack in the microwave for 20 seconds at 600W. Increase heating time in 10 second intervals to reach desired temperature if needed. Times should be reduced for microwaves with higher power ratings. If pack expands like balloon, stop heating, let it cool and then use. Remove pack carefully from microwave and knead to distribute heat evenly for desired temperature. Wrap in a cloth or protective sleeve before applying directly to the skin. Use pack in short intervals no longer than 20 mins. Remove pack if feels uncomfortable.

Packing

1X1 unit

Medical_Devices.name: Microchip Ring Reader
Medical_Devices.body:
Microchip Ring Reader

Microchip Ring Reader

Scanner is versatile, reads all FDX-B 15 digit and FDX A (FECAVA) 10 digit microchips (all brands), It is in compliance with ROHS, CE and ISO 11784 norms, convenient and portable scanner, Ergonomically designed, Lightweight, robust to use and rechargeable via a USB cable to laptop or PC

Features

  • In compliance with ROHS, CE and ISO 11784 norms
  • Ergonomically designed
  • Lightweight and robust
  • Rechargeable via a USB cable to laptop or PC

Technical details

  1. Dimensions: 135mm diameter x 33mm
  2. Weight: 163g
  3. Scans per charge: 8 second scans x 1000
  4. Standby Time: 2 months (typically)
  5. 3 hours charge time
  6. LCD 2 lines x 16 characters display

Medical_Devices.name: Pet identification Chip
Medical_Devices.body:
Pet identification Chip

Pet Identification Chip

One implant for lifetime, provides ownership proof

HS pet identification chip is ready to use application system (RFID) with unique 15-digit number for the electronic identification of animals. It is manufactured in accordance to ISO standard 11784/85 FDX B and accepted globally.

Features of Microchip:

  1. Absolutely safe with no side effects
  2. Anti-migration coating and painless insertion process
  3. Provides unique Lifetime ID
  4. Can’t be lost or altered
  5. No Geographical boundaries

Implantation sites

The implantation sites in Canines and Felines are:

  • The Transponder is implanted subcutaneous on the dorsal midline just cranial to the shoulder blades or scapula
  • The Transponder is implanted subcutaneously in the midway region of left neck

Dimensions and Packing

These are available in two dimensions:

  • 2.12 X 12mm
  • 1.5 X 9 mm

Each unit contains

1X10 units

Hair_Ball_Remover.name: Cat Laxative
Hair_Ball_Remover.body:
Cat Laxative

Indications for Use

Hairball removal and prevention

Composition

Cereals, oils and fats:

Nutritional Additives:

α-tocopherol acetate (Vitamin E) 10mg/kg

Analytical Constituents:

Crude protein – 2.2%

Crude fibre – 1.0%

Crude fats – 34.1%

Crude Ash – 1.3%

Moisture – 11.9%

Application

Most cats will take the laxative directly from the tube or from your finger, alternatively place the cat laxative on to the front paw or on the nozzle where the cat can lick it off.

To prevent hairballs:

Kittens (over 6 months): 3-6mm (0.12-0.24in) weekly, Cats: 6-13mm (0.24-0.5in) weekly

To remove hairballs:

Kittens (over 6 months): 13mm (0.5in) daily for 3 days, Cats: 25mm (1in) daily for 3 days.

Hepatic_Supplement.name: HEPA SUPPORT TABLETS
Hepatic_Supplement.body:
HEPA SUPPORT TABLETS

Liver is a very busy organ for Companion animal as toxic components easily finds their way through food, water and environment

Unique combination of all these ingredients supports phase I and phase II detoxification process

Composition:

Each tablet contains:

L methionine100 mg
N-Acetyl L -cysteine100 mg
Dimethylglycine HCl 50 mg
Milk Thistle Extract50 mg
Curcumin root Extract25 mg
Inositol20 mg
Phosphatidylcholine Complex70 mg
Vitamin B65 mg
Vitamin B1250 mcg

Helps to:

Protects hepatic cells

  • Supports Phase I and II detoxification process
  • Supports and maintain healthy Glutathione levels
  • Fat mobilization by highly absorbable Curcumin Phosphatidylcholine complex

Dosage & Administration:

For Dogs

Up to 10 Kg – 1 Tab daily

If giving more than 1 tab, divide amount between AM and PM

For Cats

1- 5 Kg – 1/2 Tabs daily

Given orally or Mix in daily food.

Or

As advised by Veterinarian

USP

  • Hepa support contains L Methionine, N Acetyl Cysteine, Milk Thistle plant, Inositol with power of DMG and unique complex of Phosphatidylcholine
  • Curcumin which enhances the body’s natural antioxidant system, in turn increases Glutathione levels, aiding in hepatic detoxification.

Ear_Care.name: Oxyfresh Ear Cleaner
Ear_Care.body:
Oxyfresh Ear Cleaner

Oxygene® works quickly to neutralize odor-causing bacteria while also gently cleaning deep into the ear canal to help remove wax buildup, ear mites, dirt, etc. ,helping to prevent infections and costly vet bills

Composition

Water,(AQUA),

Decyl Glucoside,

Stabilized Chlorine Dioxide,(Oxygene),

Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose,

Potassium Phosphate,

Sodium Hydroxide ,

Methylparaben,

Propylparaben .

Indications

  • Neutralizes Odors.
  • Removes wax , Dirt & Mites.
  • Gentle & Soothing,
  • 100% Safe & Non Toxic
  • Alcohol Free.

Presentation

237 ml

Usage

Add 10-15 drops into each ear,
Massage the ears at the base,
Let pet shake its head, gently wipe away debris.

Benefits

  • IT WORKS -To remove wax buildup, dirt and mites. Never stings, burns or irritates.
  • ITCH RELIEF – Total care for raw, itchy and smelly dog and cat ears that will have them grinning ear to ear.
  • SOOTHES EAR INFECTIONS – It helps reduce bacterial growth and soothe sensitive pet ears.
  • ELIMINATES ODORS – We don’t just mask odors, we eliminate them at the source.
  • NO ALCOHOL – No harsh chemicals, so it won’t dry out the sensitive ear canal,.
  • NON-IRRITATING – Pets love it because it soothes and doesn’t sting.
  • HASSLE FREE – No need to deal with the hassle and extra step of rinsing after treatment that is needed with other ear products.
  • SAFE, EFFECTIVE & NON-TOXIC – Best way to manage and clean dirty pet ears without harsh chemicals, additives or fragrances that can irritate sensitive ears.

Ear_Care.name: Vetramil Auris
Ear_Care.body:
Vetramil Auris

Composition

Honey

Propylene glycol,

polysorbate 80,

No antibiotics or corticosteroids.

Packaging

50 ml with canule

Usage

  • For Non acute cases
  • Control of infection for High risk dogs.
  • To use on dogs that swim Regularly.
  • 2-3 drops twice or thrice a day .

Features

  • Otitis is one of the most common diseases in our dogs.
  • Vetramil Auris supports the regenerative power of the sensitive and irritated skin of the ear canal.
  • Vetramil Auris is a unique formula that strengthen the treatment of inflammation of the ears and the irritated skin caused by an otitis externa and eczema in the ear .
  • The bactericidal activity of Dela honey protect the skin from our pampering them and their antioxidant capacity will help reduce the redness and itching.
  • Vetramil Auris contains propylene glycol, a liquid carrier which clean ear wax from the ear canal of the dog.
  • Vetramil Auris helps to reduce the application of antibiotics and corticosteroid.

Dewormers.name: Canworm Oral Suspension - Fenbendazole 10%w/v
Dewormers.body:
Canworm Oral Suspension - Fenbendazole 10%w/v

Broad spectrum de-wormer effective against Tapeworm, Hookworm, Roundworm, Whip worm and Giardia
-Effective against mature and immature stages of worm infestation
-Broad spectrum anthelmintic for: Dogs, cats, puppies, Kittens, sheep, Goat, swine, rabbit and birds -Canworm has wide safety margin and can be used effectively against worm infestation in unweaned puppies, kittens, pregnant and nursing animals

Symptoms of worm infestation:

-Weight loss


– Dull coat, Dry hairs
– Swollen belly
– Lack of appetite
– Anemia
– Lethargy
-Worms in stool
– Vomiting and sporadic diarrhea
-General poor appearance
Contents: Fenbendazole IP- 100 mg
Presentation:- 30 ml bottle
Dose rate :- Please refer pack insert

Joint_Supplements.name: Cooling spray for sport injuries
Joint_Supplements.body:
Cooling spray for sport injuries

Indications & MOA

Alleviates pain associated with:

  • Cramps
  • Joints injury
  • Pulled muscles
  • Tendon complaints
  • Sprains
  • Canine/Felines sports injuries are common. Early treatment reduces the risk of pet getting badly hurt and further damage
  • Its active ingredient gives a rapid intense cold sensation, produces a short-acting reduction in skin temperature without damaging cells
  • It cools up to 10 degree Celsius and healing process starts effectively.

Usage

Spray into the inflammation site 15cm (6 inch) distance for about 10 seconds. Wait for 1 minute before repeat treatment. Treatment can be repeated as per severity of the case

Contents

Propane, Butane, Ethanol

1 X 200 ml

Joint_Supplements.name: Stride Plus Feline
Joint_Supplements.body:
Stride Plus Feline
  • Easy to Feed Liquid Formulation for addition to Dog’s Food.
  • Contains no ingredients of animal origin and is certified 100% Vegan.
  • Palatable natural yeast flavoring, Proven in practice.
  • No possibility of presence of animal prions or viruses.
  • All ingredients from reliable and reproducible sources with highest purity.

 

Composition per 100 ml

Glucosamine HCI16,675 mg
MSM10,000 mg
Chondroitin Sulphate3,325 mg
Sodium Hyaluronate79,000 mcg
(Equivalent Hyaluronic Acid 74,500 mcg/100ml)

 

Analytical Constituents:

Crude Protein7.2%
Crude Oil0.4%
Crude Fibre0.3%
Moisture 80%


Dosage

 

Instructions for proper use:

Mix STRIDE PLUS FELINE well into the feed. Feed each cat individually.

Feeding Instructions first 30 days:

4ml per day. (2 pump strokes).

Feeding Instructions thereafter for maintenance:

2ml per day. (1 pump stroke).

The dosing pump attached to this container dispenses 2ml.

Presentation: 200 ml

USP

  • Easy to Feed Liquid Formulation for addition to Dog’s Food.
  • Contains no ingredients of animal origin.
  • Palatable natural yeast flavoring.
  • Proven in practice.
  • No possibility of presence of animal prions or viruses, all ingredients from reliable and reproducible sources with highest purity.
  • Chondroitin Sulphate in the formula has clinically proven bioavailability, and substantial absence of unusually sulphated and over-sulfated disaccharides – made up of more than 75% C6S.

Cardiac_Supplement.name: Cardio Support
Cardiac_Supplement.body:
Composition:

Each tablet contains:

L Carnitine Tartrate140 mg
Taurine140 mg
Hawthorn Extract70 mg
Eleuthero Extract70 mg
Vitamin E60 mg
Coenzyme Q1020 mg
Arjuna Extract35 mg
Magnesium (Citrate- Malate)1 mg
Potassium (Citrate- Malate)0.5 mg

Ingredients

  • L-carnitine supports the use of fat for energy and oxygen utilization while also supporting fat metabolism and helping the body balance triglyceride and cholesterol levels. Improve appetite and exercise tolerance in dogs
  • L-Taurine supports a regular heartbeat, minimizes the loss of potassium and allows for proper electrolyte utilization, particularly in cats population
  • Vitamin E provides essential antioxidant activity in fat soluble tissues
  • Potassium and Magnesium are essential for cardiac contractility and healthy heart rthym. Def of these two minerals occur concurrently so better to replete them
  • Coenzyme Q10 support heart tissue oxygenation and support heart muscle strength
  • Hawthorn extract is useful for erratic, weak heart beat useful for dogs suffering from heart failure and weakness
  • Eleuthero extract is an adaptogen to support physical stamina
  • Arjuna extract contributes to healthy heart functioning


Helps to:

  • Supports Cardiac muscle functions
  • Promotes oxygen utilization
  • Regularize Heart beat
  • Supports cardiac stress in geriatric dogs and cats
  • Helps to support overall cardiovascular health and functions

Dosage & Administrations:

  • For Dogs

Up to 10 Kg – 1 Tab daily

If giving more than 1 tab, divide between AM and PM

  • For Cats 1- 5 Kg – 1/2 Tabs daily

Give orally or mix in daily food

USP

Cardio-support is a unique combination of L- Carnitine, Taurine, Coenzyme, Hawthorn ext., Eleuthero and Arjuna ext. which supports overall cardiovascular health of dogs and cats.

Probiotic.name: Canigest
Probiotic.body:
Canigest

Canigest

CANIGEST is a highly palatable complementary feeding stuff for dogs and cats combining a probiotic, prebiotics, glutamine, kaolin and pectin. It is particularly suitable for feeding to dogs to assist in the nutritional management of digestive tract upsets.

Composition:

Canigest is a probiotic, prebiotic, glutamine, kaolin and pectin formula designed for dogs and cats with digestive tract disturbances and gastrointestinal diseases.

Probiotic – Enterococcus Faecium is a lactic acid bacteria which inhibit the growth and adhesion of a range of enteropathogens: such as enterotoxigenic E.Coli, salmonellae etc. Therefore useful as an antidiarrheal agent.

  • Enhances immune function in young dogs.
  • Has the function of improving the intestinal microbial balance.
  • Improves protective immune responses against various infections.

Prebiotics

  • Non digestible fibre foods that act as a substrate for beneficial bacteria that inhabit the natural flora of the gut.
  • FOS Supplementation has been shown to increase bifidobacterial
  • MOS aids in resistance of pathogenic colonisation

Kaolin

  • is a natural clay which absorbs excess water
  • provides a high surface area to adsorb and neutralise bacterial toxins.

Pectin

  • is dietary fibre with high fermentability.
  • coats and soothes gastrointestinal membranes
  • helps reduce volume of stool and improves stool quality

Glutamine

  • aids in the development of intestinal epithelial cells.

Composition & Dosage

CompositionPer 1 kgPer g
Rapeseed Oil, Kaolin, Fructo Oligosaccharides, Mannan Oligosaccharides, Pectin, Glutamine, Roast Meat Flavouring.

Enterococcus Faecium (NCIMB 10415)

 6.6 x 10″ cfu 6.6 x 10 0 cfu
CanigestWeightDosageFrequency
Cats1-5 kgs1 mlTwice daily
Puppies1-5 kg1 mlTwice daily
Puppies5-10 kg2 mlTwice daily
Small Dogs< 10kgs3 mlTwice daily
Medium Dogs10-25 kgs4 mlTwice daily
Large Dogs25-40 kgs5 mlTwice daily
Very Large Dogs>40 kgs5 ml3 times per day

Skin_Care_Range.name: Soft coat
Skin_Care_Range.body:
Soft coat

It is a scientifically designed feed supplement with a blend of omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids in the ratio of 10:1 along with vitamins, antioxidants and essential oils

Dietary supplement for smooth skin and shiny hair coat. Shiny hair coat and skin status reflects a healthy pet. It is a scientifically designed feed supplement with a blend of omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids in the ratio of 10:1 along with vitamins, antioxidants and essential oils.

Features:

  1. Fish Oils like Salmon, Mackerel and Red Snapper Oil rich in omega 3 fatty acid makes coat brighter and shiner
  2. Curcumin extract reduces inflammation and helps in tissue repair
  3. Vitamin A, Biotin and Zinc assists in strengthening the Ceramide layer of Skin reducing Trans Epidermal water loss (TEWL) increasing Skin Immunit
  4. Evening Primrose oil useful to relive Allergic Dermatitis and Boost immune system

Composition

Each 5 ml contains

Linoleic Acid (Omega 6)3000 mg
Linolenic Acid (Omega 3)300 mg
Eicosapentaenoic (EPA)33 mg
Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA)22 mg
Vit A563.5 IU
Alpha-tocopheryl Acetate IP9.3 IU
Pyridoxine Hydrochloride IP500 mcg
Zinc Sulphate monohydrate USP10 mg
Inositol (In an oily base)1.65 mg
Biotin 250 mcg
Curcumin extract100 mg
Vit C20 mg
Taurine10 mg
Lutein5 mg

 

Benefits:

  1. Is ideal supplement for management of Allergic Dermatitis
  2. Is ideal supplement for preventing hair fall and dandruff
  3. Is ideal supplement for recovery during Tick-Flea treatment
  4. It can be recommended as supportive therapy during bacterial and fungal therapy
  5. It is a daily supplement for overall improvement in Q.O.L of dogs and cats

Dose rate: Given orally or Mix in daily food
For dogs and Cats: 0.5ml/kg b wt./day or as advised by veterinarian

Soft coat is scientifically designed feed supplement with a blend of omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids sourced from Salmon, Mackerel and Red Herring Fish in the ratio of 10:1 with additional benefit of Biotin, Taurine and Lutein.

Skin_Care_Range.name: Vetramil Dermashampoo
Skin_Care_Range.body:
Vetramil Dermashampoo

Composition

Honey, Aloe vera, Castor oil

Packaging

150 ml bottle with measuring cup

Indication & Usage

  • Irritated /Inflammed skin( Itching, small wounds infected skin)
  • Seborrhea dry or non dry .
  • Alopecia.
  • Presence of Yeasts

Key components Action:

  • Honey: Acts as Antioxidants and enzymes purify and smooth
  • Aloe vera: Softens ,Hydrate and improves the skin.
  • Castor Oil: High Omega -9 Fatty acids for good skin condition.

Usage

  • Add dermashampoo into coat and rinse well.
  • Can be used in combination with medical treatment for more severe skin disorders.
  • Gives great shine and leaves no smell.

Skin_Care_Range.body:
Vetramail Oinment

Ointment:

Petrolatum, Cetearyl alcohol, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Paraffin, Isopropyl myristate, Mel, Thymus serpyllum, Lavandula angustifolia, Melaleuca quinquenervia, Pogostemon cablin, Ocimum basilicum

10 g, 30 g and 180 g,

  • Bitter taste
  • Insect repellent
  • Anti-fungal and anti-bacterial
  • Promotes wound healing
  • Decreases wound infection

Uses

  • Superficial and open wounds
  • Lacerations, abrasions and avulsions
  • Decubital ulcers
  • Chronic and infected wounds
  • Itchy skin and eczema
  • Abscesses
  • Wounds difficult to bandage

Stress_and_Anxiety_relief.name: Mind Calming Tablet
Stress_and_Anxiety_relief.body:
Mind Calming Tablet

Composition:

Each Tablet contains:

Ext. of Chamomile (Matricaria recutita) 45 mg

Ext. of Ginger (Zingiber officinale) 45 mg

Ext. Valerian root (Valeriana officinalis) 45 mg

Indications: –

Natural aid in alleviating-

  1. Separation and social anxiety
  2. Travelling stress
  3. Motion sickness
  4. Stress induced behavioral problems (during fireworks, excessive barking and aggression)
  5. Grooming stress
  6. Hyperactivity and destructive behavior- lack of regular exercise

Mechanism of action:

Chamomile: – It is a proven stress reliever that promotes general relaxation. Active principle is Apigenin which is anxiolytic and acts on some parts of brain and nervous system. 1

Valerian root: – It is a natural treatment for anxiety and its related digestive disturbance. It inhibits the production of enzyme that breaks down GABA, an inhibitory neurotransmitter in brain. 2

Ginger: It exerts anxiolytic effects. It is 5HT3 antagonists and eicosanoid inhibition which has antidepressant and anxiolytic effects. It also helps to manage motion sickness or upset stomach related to travel exposure to travel.2

Dosage & Administrations:

Given orally or Mix in daily food

Up to 5 kg – ½ Tab daily

5 kg – 10 kg – 1 Tab daily

10 kg – 20 kg – 2 Tabs daily

20 kg – 30 kg – 3 Tabs daily

Over 30 kg – 4 Tabs daily

Or as advised by Veterinarian

Packing

1 X 30 tabs

Caution: Safe use in pregnant animals or animals intended for breeding was not proven. If condition does not improve or worsens, stop the product administration. If accidental overdose, contact your veterinarian

Urinary_tract_supplement.name: Furinaid Plus
Urinary_tract_supplement.body:
Furinaid Plus

Furinaid Plus

Nutritional support for Cats with Feline Idiopathic Cystitis

With roast meat flavoring

Furinaid Plus is a complementary feeding stuff for cats containing N acetyl Glucosamine and L- Tryptophan in a palatable and convenient liquid form. Daily feeding will nutritionally support the Glycosaminoglycan levels in the mucosal barrier of the bladder wall and assist in the maintenance of normal nerve function

 

  • CIC is the result of multiple complex interactions between the bladder, nervous system, endocrine system, husbandry practices and the environments
  • Findings include Urothelial Ulceration with inflammation and fibrosis
  • CIC may result from alterations in the protective glycosaminoglycan (GAG) layer that lines the bladder

Composition

  • N-Acetyl Glucosamine (NAG, 6.25%) – helps replenish the protective Glycosaminoglycan (GAG) layer
  • L-tryptophan – is an amino acid and is the precursor to neurotransmitters serotonin and melatonin.
  • These play a role which may improve mood and relieve stress and anxiety in cats

Dosage

    • Instructions for proper use: Mix FURINAID PLUS well into the feed. Feed each cat individually.
    • Feeding Instructions first 14 days: 6 ml per day. Feeding Instructions thereafter for maintenance: 4 ml per day.

The dosing pump attached to this container dispenses 2ml.

For Dogs

First 14 days
Small dogs upto 10 kgs: 6 ml
Medium dogs from 10-25 kgs : 8 ml
Large dogs 25-40 kgs : 10 ml
Very Large Dogs over 40 kg : 12 ml
Maintenance
Small dogs upto 10 kg : 4 ml
Medium dogs from 10-25 kgs : 6 ml
Large dogs 25-40 kgs : 8 ml
Very Large Dogs over 40 kg : 10 ml

Clinical signs of Feline Idiopathic Cystitis (FIC) include:

Signs of difficulty and pain when urinating (dysuria)

Increased frequency of urination (pollakiuria)

Blood in the urine (hematuria)

Urination outside litter box and urgency to urinate

Complete obstruction to urine outflow

Behavioral change

Loss of litter box training

Aggression

What type of cats suffer from Feline Idiopathic Cystitis

  • FIC can affect cats of any age but mostly affects young to middle aged cats
  • Over weight cats
  • Neutered cats are more susceptible
  • Persian and Black & White domestic cats are predisposed
  • Occurs equally in male and female cats
  • Stress- moving house or travelling, weather changes or when household routine is disrupted

Instructions for Proper use:

Mix FURINAID PLUS well into the feed. Feed each individually

Feeding instructions first 14 days: 6 ml per day

Feeding Instructions thereafter for maintenance: 4 ml per day

Dosing pump attached to this container dispenses 2 ml

Presentation: 200 ml

Urinary_tract_supplement.name: URO SUPPORT Tablets
Urinary_tract_supplement.body:
URO SUPPORT Tablets

Uro Support for Dogs features an advanced combination of ingredients that work together to support normal bladder function and health

Composition

Pumpkin Seed Powder100 mg
Rehmannia Root120 mg
Wild Yam Extract100 mg
Soy protein concentrate40 mg
Saw Palmetto Extract30 mg
Cranberry Extract25 mg
Dandelion whole plant powder50 mg
Vitamin C25 mg

Helps to:

  • Strengthening of bladder muscles and supports urinary incontinence
  • Support bladder muscle tone
  • Cranberry ext. decreases bacterial growth and adhesion of bacteria to Urinary system
  • Synergistic natural ingredients to support overall urinary tract health

Dosage & Administrations:

For Dogs

Up to 10 Kg – 1 Tab daily

If giving more than 1 tab, divide amount between AM and PM

For Cats

1- 5 Kg – 1/2 Tabs daily

Given orally or Mix in daily food.

Or

As advised by Veterinarian

USP

  • Unique formulation with combination of Pumpkin seed powder, Rehmania root, Wild yam, soy protein concentrate, Cranberry extract and Dandleon.
  • Cranberry extract maintains healthy urinary tract and healthy bladder by blocking irritants
  • Dandleon has diuretic effect and supports liver and gall bladder and has anti-inflammatory properties
